column5: This is a quiet 16 unit condo complex on the bay side. This condo is in a great location which is one block from the main strip, two blocks from the beach and near the entertainment district. Sorry, no pets allowed.This unit will sleep six. One bedroom queen size bed with large closet. One bath. Bunk beds and a full size sofa sleeper. Washer and dryer and all linens and kitchen amenities are accessible. TV with cable and high speed Wi-Fi. A $40 one time cleaning fee for all stays is required.
column8: Quiet Affordable Condo on South Padre Island, TX
